thread.title: Nicole Scherzinger flashes bra at London's Paper nightclub | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Nicole Scherzinger flashes bra at London's Paper nightclub | Daily Mail Online

author: Ciara Farmer For Mailonline
title: Nicole Scherzinger flashes bra at London's Paper nightclub | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Slotting right in with the ladies, the group all pulled lookalike poses with plump pouts at the ready and a well rehearsed intense glare into the camera. Aside from her scanty frolics, Nicole then swarmed the DJ booth to perform an impromptu rap routine, as she went to DJ Jo Jo and asked to take the microphone to do a “shout out” to the crowd. Sexy stuff: The 38-year-old X Factor judge looked sensational in a racy leather coord layered beneath a white tuxedo jacket as she jumped on the stage to perform a rap before reportedly spending a whopping £10,000 behind the bar Ten big bucks: Nicole looked stunning for her night out, as she threw herself wholeheartedly into the hard-partying ethos of the celebrity hot spot Hot stuff: Aside from her scanty frolics, Nicole then swarmed the DJ booth to perform an impromptu rap routine, as she went to DJ Jo Jo and asked to take the microphone to do a “shout out” to the crowd Making her way: Nicole was naturally treated like a top VIP Leather lady: Nicole's getup was nothing short of sensational Out and a pout: The stunner pulled all her best poses for the camera As if her raucous antics were not wild enough, she then ordered an extraordinary 10 bottles of luxurious Dom Perignon champagne. The bubbles were brought in by the club’s dancers, called The PaperDolls who were wearing extremely skimpy Bluebella lingerie. Nicole was thrilled and gushed to the girls: 'Oh my God! You guys look amazing, and you are great dancers you are really inspirational, and where do you get your outfits from?' Earlier in the evening, Nicole attended Wonderland Magazine's LFW party in association with the new, limited edition Really Blue Pixel phone by Google at TRAMP. Sizzlers: As if her raucous antics were not wild enough, she then ordered an extraordinary 10 bottles of luxurious Dom Perignon champagne Twerk it out: Having come from a dance troupe, Nicole's moves are clear to see Sparking it up: The clubgoers were loving life with their celeb cohort Hot mama! She knew how to rouse the crowd in the club Shout out! The stunner took the mic with skill Wow! The dancers looked nothing short of sensational in their racy clobber She appeared to have taken style notes from singer MC Hammer though as she wore a pair of red vinyl harem trousers which seriously caught the eye. Showing off her ample assets, she teamed it with a rather skimpy black leather bralet which also revealed a flash of her toned abs. Not content with the level of glamour, the former Pussycat Doll also threw on a pair of skyscraper heels by Christian Louboutin. She did cover up a little though, wearing a black waistcoat over the top of her look. Snap away: As she was approached with the pricey booze, she looked delighted and snapped a pic Two outfits, one night: Earlier in the evening, Nicole attended Wonderland Magazine's LFW party in association with the new, limited edition Really Blue Pixel phone by Google at TRAMP Icon: MC Hammer was a champion of the harem trouser trend in the 90s A new look: She's not afraid to push the boundaries when it comes to fashion and Nicole did just that when she headed out to party on Tuesday night Close: She was in good company on the night as she was joined by a host of famous faces including her friend, singer Ray BLK (right) The stunner also had flashes of red woven into her hair which she wore piled high on top of her head. She was in good company on the night as she was joined by a host of famous faces including her friend, singer Ray BLK. Nicola Hughes of Made In Chelsea fame was not prepared to go unnoticed, wearing a rather revealing pink sheer top with no bra underneath. Cheeky! Nicola Hughes of Made In Chelsea fame was not prepared to go unnoticed, wearing a rather revealing pink sheer top with no bra underneath She flashed her abs, teaming her rather raunchy number with a pair of plaid trousers. Nicole has just returned from a work trip to Cape Town where she filmed the latest Muller yogurt advert. The Hawaii-born stunner's top contained her ample assets as she charged around the Green Point Athletics track in the South African city. Gucci girl: X Factor's Fleur East was also present and brought some style to the party All the ideas: New york singer and DJ MAAD (2nd left)arrives at Wonderland Magazine's LFW party Share or comment on this article 159
